title: New: alayna – Falling Autumn
body:
Brooklyn’s **alayna**calls in the production duties of Astronomyy on her official debut single, a smooth, R&B inspired jam that nods toward the likes of Shura, Say Lou Lou and Haim.

All centred around a colossally anthemic chorus, it’s real signal of intent from the young singer. Check out _Falling Autumn_ below.

excerpt.full: Brooklyn’s alayna calls in the production duties of Astronomyy on her official debut single, a smooth, R&B inspired jam that nods toward the likes of Shura, Say Lou Lou and Haim. All centred around a colossally anthemic chorus, it’s real signal of intent from the young singer. Check out Falling Autumn below.
